ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: true, a very nice item to have around.  i now carry one, from all the recent times i have gone in alone to retrieve my corpse in PoF (got tired of waiting for
ygData.messageBody:
true, a very nice item to have around. i now carry one, from all the recent
times i have gone in alone to retrieve my corpse in PoF (got tired of
waiting for someone to help me out, and the corpse timer is running),
standing on a ledge, shivering while playing my invis song surrounded by 40
corpses waiting for someone to come get me.

only thing is, you can only carry one. they are lore. do i know this for
sure? no, but this is what the monk who was lying on the ground next to me
that time told me when i asked if he had an extra for me other than the one
he was waiting to use.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L29 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L21 Wood Elf Warrior
Erisi Dlarit, L24 High Elf Paladin (in stasis)
Mithaniel Marr Server


> I plan on having me a few gate potions on hand when I decide
> to live in
> lower guk for a while.
>
>
> Tuldar 34th bard Tarew Marr
> (41st necro as msecondary character)
